articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed an art performance given by the Mansudae Art Troupe.
					 The artistes of the art troupe honored with "Kim Il Sung Order" put on the stage such colorful numbers as chorus "We Will Live With the Leader Forever", "Party Represents Care of the General", 10 women group singing and chorus "Moranbong" and female solo "My Korea".
					
					 The performers enthusiastically sang of the shining course of struggle covered by the Korean revolution winning victories only under the leadership of Kim Jong Il and successfully represented the heroic stamina and indomitable will of the army and people of the DPRK to dash ahead toward the high eminence of a thriving nation under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					 They successfully represented all numbers with high artistry, strikingly demonstrating the might of the prestigious art troupe.
					
					 When the performance was over, Kim Jong Il waved back to the enthusiastically cheering performers and audience and congratulated the performers on their successful performance. 
					
					 Expressing great satisfaction over the fact that the artistes of the troupe gave a splendid performance rich in ideological contents and high in  artistry as it is distinct in the political stand and fully reflects the desire and wishes of the people, he extended high appreciation and thanks to all the creators and artistes.
					
					 Since its foundation the art troupe has created and performed a lot of successful works of peculiar genres as required by the times by successfully embodying the WPK's idea of literature and arts, thereby greatly contributing to the development of Juche-based arts and rendering positive services for educating the party members and other working people in a revolutionary way, he said, highly appreciating their laudable achievements.
					
					 He expressed the expectation and conviction that the creators and artistes of the art troupe would as ever preserve its tradition as a revolutionary art troupe and encourage the army and people in the struggle for accomplishing the cause of building a thriving nation through courageous art creation and performing activities, indicating important tasks which would serve as guidelines for their art creation and performing activities.
					
					 Among the audience were KPA Vice-Marshal Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA General Kim Jong Gak, member of the NDC of the DPRK and first vice-director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA and other commanding officers of the army and leading officials of the WPK Central Committee including its Secretaries Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam and Department Director Kim Kyong Hui.

articles.title: DPRK-China Friendship Banquet Given
articles.content:
DPRK-China Friendship Banquet Given
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK National Defence Commission gave a banquet Saturday evening on the assumption of office as new Chinese ambassador to the DPRK.  
					 Present at the banquet was General Secretary Kim Jong Il.  
					
					 Among those present there were senior officials of the WPK Central Committee including its Secretaries Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam and Kim Jong Gak, member of the NDC and first vice-director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, and KPA Generals Kim Won Hong and Hyon Chol Hae and other commanding officers of the NDC and the KPA and leading officials of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
					
					 Present there on invitation were staff members of the Chinese embassy here and the Chinese Tianjin women's volleyball team on a visit to the DPRK. 
					
					 When Kim Jong Il appeared in the banquet hall together with the new Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, all the participants warmly welcomed him with highest tribute as he has made an undying contribution to boosting the DPRK-China friendship.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam and Ambassador Liu Hongcai made toasts. 
					
					 They expressed the steadfast will of the parties and peoples of the two countries to further develop and consolidate generation after generation the traditional DPRK-China friendship provided and fostered by the leaders of the elder generation of the two countries. 
					
					 The banquet proceeded in a cordial atmosphere overflowing with the friendship.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Gambian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Gambian President
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Talks between Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, and Yaya A. J. J. Jammeh, president of Gambia, were held at the Presidential Palace on Friday.
					 Yaya A. J. J. Jammeh said that it is well known that as an independent country the DPRK guided by the great Juche idea rendered sincere help to African countries in their liberation struggle in colonies.
					
					 The exploits of President Kim Il Sung performed by extending material and moral support to the African countries in their struggle for independence will always remembered, he stressed.
					
					 Both sides at the talks exchanged views on the matter of boosting the bilateral friendly and cooperative relations in various fields and on issues of mutual concern.
					
					 On hand were Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Kyong Son, DPRK ambassador to Gambia, and Mariama Khan, general secretary of the presidential office, Lamin Kaba Bajo, minister of Fishery, Water Resources and Parliamentary Affairs, and other officials concerned.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Senegalese President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Senegalese President
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Abdoulaye Wade, president of Senegal, Friday on the occasion of the golden jubilee of its independence. 
					 Noting that the Senegalese people have made many successes in the struggle for consolidating the political independence of the country and achieving the sustainable economic development over the past 50 years after its independence, the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in various fields in the future, too. 
					
					 The message wholeheartedly wished the president good health and happiness and the Senegalese people greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Women's Union Officials Plant Trees
articles.content:
Women's Union Officials Plant Trees
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Officials of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea and its members planted trees in the arboretum of the Kumsusan Memorial Palace on Friday on the threshold of the Day of the Sun.
					 Officials of the Central Committee of the union and its organizations and their members in different parts of the country including Anak, Hwaphyong  and Kumya counties and Wonsan and Kaesong cities visited the arboretum with truckloads of over 18,000 trees of 22 species and more than 140,000 flower roots of 10 species and tools for tending trees.
					
					 They planted magnolia, persimmon trees, large tara vine trees and other trees in the arboretum with great care.

articles.title: New Feature Film Produced
articles.content:
New Feature Film Produced
Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The Korean Film Studio recently produced new feature film "The Country I Saw" (parts 4 and 5.)
					The film makes an artistic representation of the fact that the DPRK has safeguarded the sovereignty of the country and exalted the dignity of the nation with the might of Songun despite the persistent hostile policy pursued by the imperialists including the Japanese reactionaries towards the DPRK.
					
					The U.S., Japan and south Korean puppet group put unprecedented international pressure on the DPRK in the wake of its satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					The Japanese reactionaries kick up such noisy anti-DPRK racket as calling for an urgent meeting of the UN Security Council, availing themselves of the scheme of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group.
					
					They disturb the activities of a woman professor of international politics admiring the DPRK and resort to dastardly moves to win to their side her daughter who broke with her mother out of her misunderstanding.
					
					The heroine of the film and other conscientious figures of Japan strongly rebuff and denounce the "presidential statement" of the UNSC as soon as it was issued and are struck with deep admiration at the DPRK's independent politics and the might of Songun, when witnessing another nuclear test conducted by the DPRK.
					
					The daughter of the professor, too, experiences the vicious moves of the Japanese reactionaries and realizes that the road taken by her mother is the path of justice.
					
					The film emphasizes that only victory and glory are in store for Juche Korea holding in high esteem General Secretary Kim Jong Il, illustrious commander born of Heaven possessed of matchless pluck and grit

articles.title: Sowing on Cold Beds for Rice Seedlings Begins
articles.content:
Sowing on Cold Beds for Rice Seedlings Begins
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Sowing on cold beds for rice seedlings has begun on co-op farms of the DPRK.
					 The agricultural workers of the DPRK have launched a campaign to finish the sowing in the best season as the spring sowing was delayed by the decrease in the overall percentage of sunshine as compared with the average.
					
					 Rural areas in South Hwanghae, South Phyongan and North Hwanghae provinces have kept the seed treatment and sprouting ahead of other work since they worked out proper plans for each day and field. They are registering good results everyday in qualitatively sowing seeds on all cold beds sufficiently covered with humus soil.
					
					 The North Phyongan Province has already finished sowing on cold beds for rice seedlings covering more than 360 hectares.
					
					 Co-op farms in Anbyon and Hamju counties and other areas on the east coast have set about the above-said sowing as the time is fit for the work.

articles.title: Japan's Distortion of Korean History
articles.content:
Japan's Distortion of Korean History
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The Japanese imperialists had left no stone unturned to distort and erase the time-honored history of the Korean nation during more than four decades of their colonial fascist rule over Korea.
					 They began ransacking bookshops, Confucian schools, lecture-halls and houses across the country by mobilizing gendarme and police from November 1910 to seize history books related with Tangun Korea and national classics.
					
					 More than 200,000 volumes of books were burnt away by them through the search operation.
					
					 They organized the "Society of Compilation of Korean History Book" involving pro-Japanese traitors of Korea and government-paid historians of Japan with the "superintendent-general of Political Affairs of the Government-general in Korea" as its chairman in June 1925 to publish "Korean History" (30 volumes in six parts). 
					
					 In the book, they alleged that the history of Korea started in the period of Silla (early middle part of the 1st century to 935).
					
					 They also described the histories of the ancient states prior to the three kingdoms (Koguryo, Paekje and Silla) as those of primitive society or legendary ones. By fabricating the theory of "Mimana Miyake" (Japan's government agency of Imna), they asserted that the southern part of Korea had been under the control of Japan since the outset of its history. 
					
					 In a bid to justify their allegation, they twisted even the contents of the monument to the Mausoleum of Kwanggaetho, a king of Koguryo.
					
					 In this way they erased nearly 3000 years in the history of the Korean nation in the book.
					
					 They also termed the history of the Korean people's struggle against foreign invaders one of their "subordination" to big powers of the Asian Continent and beautified the history of their Korea aggression.

articles.title: Anniversary of Apr. 3 Uprising on Jeju Island Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Apr. 3 Uprising on Jeju Island Observed
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The popular uprising that took place on Jeju Island on April 3, 1948 was patriotic and just anti-U.S., anti-fascist popular resistance to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country against the colonial enslavement policy of the U.S. imperialists towards south Korea and their moves to split the nation into two.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a signed article.
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 After the liberation of Korea the U.S. imperialists enforced a harsh military rule upon illegally occupying south Korea. At the outset of 1948 they were crafty enough to bring to it the "UN Temporary Commission on Korea" abusing the name of the UN in a bid to perpetuate their colonial domination by setting up a "separate government" in south Korea.
					
					 The people on Jeju Island rose in a popular armed uprising against the unilateral "May 10 separate elections" carried by the stooges of the U.S. imperialists. They waged powerful just resistance, attacking and destroying institutions for enforcing a repressive rule and restoring the people's committees forcibly disorganized by them.
					
					 Much scared by this, the U.S. imperialists dispatched Robert, "head of the U.S. military advisory group" in south Korea, to the spot to command an operation to put down the uprising. The fascist tyrants indiscriminately murdered at least 70,000 persons or one fourth of the population of the island.
					
					 Through their bloody resistance the patriotic people on the island taught all the Koreans truth that the U.S. imperialists are the enemy of the Korean nation with whom they cannot live under the same sky and to wage an indomitable anti-U.S. struggle is the only way of achieving independence and democracy in south Korean society and national reunification.
					
					 Much water has flown under the bridge since the uprising but the south Korean people are still witnessing the dignity and sovereignty of the nation being trampled down and democracy and human rights wantonly violated by foreign forces and traitors.
					
					 The struggle of people from all walks of life to put an end to the foreign domination and interference and achieve the peace and reunification of the country by their concerted efforts in the spirit of "By our nation itself" is mounting higher in south Korea. This clearly indicates that the south Korean people, awakened in the course of the struggle, are filled with the will not to tolerate any longer the arbitrary practices of the aggressors and the anti-reunification moves of the traitors but to bring about a landmark phase in the movement for independent reunification under the uplifted banner of the north-south joint declaration.

articles.title: Judgment to S. Korean Dictatorial Regime Called for
articles.content:
Judgment to S. Korean Dictatorial Regime Called for
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea on Mar. 27 released a resolution titled "Let's move up the era of national prosperity by achieving peace and judging the dictatorial regime".
					 The resolution condemned the U.S. and the anti-reunification forces of south Korea for making desperate efforts to keep Korea divided into two parts indefinitely despite the daily growing desire of the Korean nation for peace and reunification.
					
					 It noted that the south Korean society is groaning under the dictatorial rule of the present regime and the inter-Korean cooperation and exchanges are blocked and the pain resulting from the national division persists due to the moves of the anti-reunification forces.
					
					 Judging the present regime is the short-cut to peace and reunification, the resolution noted, calling upon all the progressive forces to achieve alliance and solidarity to win the upcoming "election to the local self-governing bodies" without fail.

articles.title: S. Koreas' Suppression of Activists for Reunification under Fire
articles.content:
S. Koreas' Suppression of Activists for Reunification under Fire
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress of south Korea made public a statement titled "Stop to the suppression of the activists for reunification" on March 30.
					 The statement accused the security authorities of simultaneously conducting that day a search operation against the houses of former leading members of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea and the representative of the "Mirae" Opera Troupe under the organization on the charge of violating the "National Security Law".
					
					 The statement went on: The security authorities orchestrated the case of the above-said solidarity for implementing the joint declaration and arrested many members of the solidarity and threw them behind bars as part of the suppression of the candlelight action in 2008. Not content with this, the security authorities are now stretching out their tentacles of crackdown to its former members.
					
					 The suppression of the non-governmental organization for the reunification movement formed for the purpose of implementing the June 15 joint declaration on charges of "profiting the enemy" and violating the NSL disclosed the anti-reunification nature of the authorities keen to improve the south-north relations and block national reunification movement, the statement held, declaring that the solidarity would resist the authorities' suppression of the activists for the reunification movement through united actions.

articles.title: Struggle for Settlement of Ryongsan Tragedy Declared
articles.content:
Struggle for Settlement of Ryongsan Tragedy Declared
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations of south Korea held an inaugural ceremony of the Committee for Probing the Truth behind the Ryongsan Tragedy in Seoul on March 29.
					 Speakers at the ceremony referred to the fact that the All-People Committee for Measures against the Murder of Evacuees in Ryongsan including people from all walks of life such as workers, peasants and religionists would be reorganized into a larger committee for probing the truth behind the Ryongsan tragedy for the purpose of escalating the actions for probing the truth behind the tragedy, punishing the main culprit of the murder and holding in check "the redevelopment."
					
					 A funeral service for the victims of the Ryongsan tragedy was held, but this does not mean that the problem has been solved, they held.
					
					 They declared that they would struggle to the last for the full settlement of the problem.

articles.title: Important Days in April Observed
articles.content:
Important Days in April Observed
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibitions, lectures, film shows and reading sessions took place in Mexico, Uganda and Ethiopia between Mar. 23 and 30 on the occasions of the Day of the Sun, the 17th anniversary of General Secretary      Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and the 78th anniversary of the foundation of the Korean People's Army.
					 Displayed in the venue of the exhibitions were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and photos on their feats and books, photos and Korean handicrafts on the Korean people's efforts to build a thriving nation.
					
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico highly praised the President as a peerlessly great man who saved the destiny of the Korean people and trained them to be the most independent and revolutionary people.
					
					The chairman of the Kampala City Committee of the Uganda National Resistance Movement stressed that socialist Korea is now demonstrating its might as an invincible power under the leadership of
						 Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The secretary general of the Ethiopian Youth Study Committee of the Juche Idea noted that thanks to Kim Jong Il the politico-ideological and military and technological might of the KPA has grown stronger than ever before.
					
					 The chief of a branch of the above-said committee highly praised the President as a great man who devoted his whole life to the people, saying that Kim Jong Il developed the DPRK into a powerful nation by enforcing the Songun policy for the people.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched Korean films "Arms of DPRK", "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" and "Pyongyang at Night ".

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Germany
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation" was brought out in booklet by a German Publishing House on Mar. 27.
					 The work published on April 18, Juche 87 (1998) clarifies the five-point policy for the great national unity which serves as guidelines for achieving the great unity of the whole nation.

articles.title: Mexican Committee Issues Bulletin
articles.content:
Mexican Committee Issues Bulletin
 Pyongyang, April 3 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism issued bulletin No. 37, carrying a portrait of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, on the occasion of the 17th anniversary of his election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and the 78th anniversary of the foundation of the Korean People's Army.
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Kim Jong Il, chairman of the NDC of the DPRK, and invincible power" referred to the fact that he has consolidated the politico-ideological position of the country as firm as a rock under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea, the Songun idea.
					
					 It noted that he made sure that all the people learned from the undaunted and noble ideological and moral traits being displayed by the service personnel of the KPA by paying primary attention to training them to be fighters strong in transparent thinking and faith, thereby making it possible for the DPRK to steadily advance the cause of socialism by dint of inexhaustible might of the ideology of the servicepersons and people even in the severest adversity.
					
					 Under the dynamic leadership of Kim Jong Il the Korean people have made eye-opening successes in the efforts to build a thriving nation, the bulletin added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia funcion del Conjunto Artistico Mansudae
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia funcion del Conjunto Artistico Mansudae
Pyongyang, 3 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente   Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, asistio a la funcion del Conjunto Artistico Mansudae laureado con la honorifica Orden Kim Il Sung.
					Los ejecutantes pusieron en la escena diversas piezas, entre otras, el coro "Vivimos siempre junto al Lider", "el Partido es el regazo del General", las 10 cantantes femeninas y coro "Colina Moran" y el solo femenino "Mi Corea".
					
					Ellos cantaron en tono patetico la brillante trayectoria de lucha de la revolucion coreana que salia siempre victoriosa siguiendo al Dirigente y demostraron bien el impetu heroico y la indoblegable voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea que corren a todo galope hacia la cumbre de la gran potencia prospera con la bandera del Songun en alto.
					
					Tambien describieron magnificamente con alta habilidad artistica todas las obras y manifestaron con vigor la potencia de la prestigiosa entidad artistica.
					
					Terminada la funcion, el Dirigente respondio a las efusivas aclamaciones de los ejecutantes y espectadores y felicito el exito de la funcion. 
					
					Muy satisfecho de que los artistas del Conjunto ofrecieron la magnifica funcion con alto nivel ideo-artistico que mantuvo la firmeza politica y reflejo bien la aspiracion y el anhelo del pueblo coreano, evaluo altamente exito de su funcion y dio agradecimiento a todos los creadores y artistas.
					
					El Conjunto Artistico Mansudae, desde su fundacion hasta hoy, creo y represento numerosas magnificas obras especificas que demanda la epoca materializando con brillantez la idea del Partido en materia de la literatura y arte, gracias a lo cual hizo un gran aporte al desarrollo del arte jucheano y a la educacion revolucionaria de los militantes del partido y otros trabajadores, senalo y aprecio altamente sus exitos orgullosos del pasado.
					
					Manifesto su esperanza y conviccion de que los creadores y los artistas del Conjunto desplegaran energicamente en el futuro tambien las actividades de creacion artistica manteniendo la tradicion del colectivo artistico revolucionario y estimularan   con vigor al ejercito y el pueblo de Corea a la lucha por realizar la causa de la construccion de la gran potencia prospera, presento las tareas programaticas que sirven de guia en la creacion y las actividades artisticas.
					
					Le acompanaron el vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak, miembro del CDN de la RPDC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC y otros miembros directivos del ejercito, los secretarios del CC del PTC Choe Thae Bok y Kim Ki Nam, la jefa de departamento del CC del PTC Kim Kyong Hui y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre Kim Yong Nam y Yaya A. J. J. Jammeh
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre Kim Yong Nam y Yaya A. J. J. Jammeh
Pyongyang, 3 de abril (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 2 en el palacio presidencial las conversaciones entre el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, y el presidente de la Republica de Gambia, Yaya A. J. J. Jammeh.
					En la ocasion, el mandatario gambiano recordo que Corea, pais independiente que toma por guia directriz la gran idea Juche, esta conocida ampliamente por haber apoyado sinceramente la lucha de los paises africanos por la liberacion nacional colonial.
					
					Subrayo que seran eternas las hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung quien dio apoyo y respaldo material-espirituales a la lucha de los paises africanos por la independencia.
					
					En las conversaciones, ambas partes intercambiaron opiniones sobre el problema de ampliar y desarrollar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises en diversos dominios y otros problemas de interes mutuo.
					
					Estuvieron presentes alli el vicecanciller coreano Kim Hyong Jun y el embajador coreano acreditado en este pais africano, Ri Kyong Son; el secretario general de la presidencia, Mariama Khan, el ministro de Pesqueria, Recursos Hidraulicos y de Asuntos Parlamentarios, Lamin Kaba Bajo, y otros interesados de Gambia.

articles.title: Banquete en honor de Kim Yong Nam
articles.content:
Banquete en honor de Kim Yong Nam
Pyongyang, 3 de abril (ATCC) -- Se ofrecio el dia primero un banquete en honor del presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, quien realiza una visita oficial y de amistad a la Republica de Gambia.
					Junto con Kim, fueron invitados a la recepcion el ministro de Salud Publica Choe Chang Sik, el vicecanciller Kim Hyong Jun, el viceministro de Comercio Exterior Ri Myong San, el embajador coreano en este pais africano Ri Kyong Son y otros asistentes.
					
					Tambien participaron la vicepresidenta de Gambia Aja Isatou Njie Saidy, el presidente de la Asamblea Nacional Elizabeth Lenne, ministros del gobierno, los comandantes del Ejercito y otros interesados, los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises y los representantes de las organizaciones internacionales acreditados en este pais africano.
					
					La vicepresidenta gambiana, en su discurso, se refirio a que en el pasado Corea logro grandes exitos aun en medio de la persistente intervencion de las fuerzas foraneas y destaco que el pueblo coreano, con fuerte voluntad y valentia, ejerce influencia en la escena internacional.
					
					Apunto que las relaciones entre los dos paises se desarrollan favorablemente por el deseo comun y expreso su conviccion de que seran realizados los planes para el desarrollo socio-economico y se fortaleceran mas las relaciones de cooperacion bilateral.
					
					Kim Yong Nam, a su vez, destaco que el gobierno y el pueblo de Gambia alcanzaron exitos en la labor para eliminar las consecuencias coloniales, consolidar la independencia nacional y lograr el desarrollo economico y la prosperidad del pais.
					
					Subrayo que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il presta gran atencion al desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con Gambia y manifesto su esperanza de que la presente visita servira de una oportunidad que de nueva vitalidad al desarrollo de las relaciones de cooperacion bilateral existentes entre ambos paises.
					
					En la ocasion hubo la funcion de los artistas gambianos.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam arriba a Banjul
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam arriba a Banjul
Pyongyang, 3 de abril (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, llego el dia primero a Banjul para realizar una visita oficial y de amistad a la Republica de Gambia.
					 Le acompanan el ministro de Salud Publica Choe Chang Sik, el vicecanciller Kim Hyong Jun, el viceministro de Comercio Exterior Ri Myong San y otros.
					
					En el aeropuerto, Kim Yong Nam y su comitiva fueron acogidos por la vicepresidenta de Gambia Aja Isatou Njie Saidy, la ministra de Energia Sirra Wally Ndou Njaie, el ministro de Finanzas y Asuntos Economicos Abdoo Kolley, el ministro de Pesqueria, Recursos Hidraulicos y de Asuntos Parlamentarios Lamin Kaba Bajo y otros ministros del gobierno, los comandantes del Ejercito y otros interesados, Ri Kyong Son, embajador coreano, y otros diplomaticos de varios paises acreditados en este pais africano.
					
					 En la terminal aerea hubo la ceremonia para dar bienvenida a Kim Yong Nam.
					
					 Numerosos ciudadanos y artistas dieron calurosa bienvenida a los huespedes coreanos.
					
					 Kim publico una declaracion de llegada.
